analyzed: prameya adhyāyaḥ
prathamam āhnikam

original: nyā. pa. prame. 1 evaṃ saparikaraṃ pramāṇaṃ viśodhitam /
analyzed: evam sa parikaram pramāṇam viśodhitam
atha prameyam pradarśayāmaḥ

original: tatra yat punaḥ ṣaṭsaptādirūpeṇa padārthān vibhajya vaiśeṣikādayaścintayanti,
analyzed: tatra yat punar ṣaṣ sapta ādi rūpeṇa padārthān vibhajya vaiśeṣika ādayaḥ cintayanti
tat na sākṣāt apavarga aṅgam iti taiḥ eva abhyupetam
api ca vidyamāna parityāgāt asatām ca parigrahāt
vyāmohanāḥ vimarśāḥ te bahiṣkāryāḥ mumukṣubhiḥ
sa avāntara vibhāgeṣu tad tad cintā śrameṣu iha
a vistarāya diś mātram doṣāṇām abhidadhmahe
yat tatra āhuḥ abhidheyaḥ padārthaḥ
sa ca bhāva abhāva bhedena dvidhā iti
tat tāvat asat vyapadeśāt na iti ced na
dharma antareṇa vākyaśeṣa ādi ukteḥ
śabda antarāt ca iti ārambhaṇa adhikaraṇa sūtreṇa abhāvasya para abhyupagata abhāva abhāvasya iva bhāva antara tva samarthanāt pratikṣiptam

original: yadapi ca--- dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyarūpeṇa bhāvarūpāṇāṃ padārthānāṃ ṣoḍhā parisaṃkhyānam,
analyzed: yat api ca dravya guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣa samavāya rūpeṇa bhāva rūpāṇām padārthānām ṣoḍhā parisaṃkhyānam

original: tadapi vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇe “samavāyābhyupagamācca sāmyādanavasthiteḥ” iti sūtrakāraireva samavāyākhyapadārthāntaradūśaṇena parāstam /
analyzed: tat api vaiśeṣika adhikaraṇe samavāya abhyupagamāt ca sāmyāt anavasthiteḥ iti sūtrakāraiḥ eva samavāya ākhya padārtha antara dūśaṇena parāstam
abhāva tad adhikaraṇayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva saṃnidhi viśeṣa ādi śabda vācya saṃbandha antara anumānam api samavāya dūṣaṇa chāyayā eva dūṣitam eva

original: yaścānyonyamatyantatulyeṣu muktātmādiṣu mitho vyāvṛttadhījananāya dravyatvādihetunā viśeṣākhyaḥ padārthaḥ kalpyate,
analyzed: yaḥ ca anyonyam atyanta tulyeṣu muktātma ādiṣu mithas vyāvṛtta dhī jananāya dravya tva ādi hetunā viśeṣa ākhyaḥ padārthaḥ kalpyate
saḥ api tulya nyāya tayā sūtrakāraiḥ dūṣita prāyaḥ eva
mahat dīrghavat vā hva sva parimaṇḍalābhyām iti anupapanna paramāṇu dvyaṇuka ādi prakriyā nidarśanena anyeṣām api tad abhyupagatānām unapapanna tvasya sūcita tvāt ca

original: api cānityeṣu dravyeṣu tāvajjātiguṇapādibhireva vyāvṛttadhīḥ sidhyatīti nityeṣu hi viśeṣonyaḥ kalpyate;
analyzed: api ca anityeṣu dravyeṣu tāvat jāti guṇa pādibhiḥ eva vyāvṛtta dhīḥ sidhyati iti nityeṣu hi viśeṣaḥ anyaḥ kalpyate
yathā āhuḥ nitya dravya vṛttayaḥ ntyāḥ viśeṣāḥ iti
tathā api vedāntibhiḥ diś saṃjñaka vibhu padārtha antara anabhyupagamāt ākāśasya ca kāryatva ādi śruteḥ
prakṛti vikāra bhūta pṛthivī ādi aṃśa viśeṣa atirikta paramāṇu jāla pratikṣepāt tathāvidha paramāṇūnām
ca avasthā pravāhasya anādi anta tvāt na tatra viśeṣa kḷptiḥ
tatas kāla ātmānau pariśiṣyete
tatra api cetanānām na kāla tattvam ātma tayā bhāti
kṣaṇa lava ādi avasthā yogi tva parāktva acetana tva ādibhiḥ eva
tasmāt sveṣām svebhyaḥ ca tasya vyāvṛtta dhī saṃbhavāt
anyathā anyena api kalpitena tad asaṃbhava prasaṅgāt
atas ātma pariśeṣe tatra api jīva īśvarayoḥ aṇu tva vibhu tva niyāmya tva niyantṛ tva ādheya tva ādhāra tva śeṣa tva śeṣi tva śarīra tva śarīra
itvā ābhiḥ anekavidhaiḥ dharma bhedaiḥ vyāvṛtta dhī siddhau kim anyena viśeṣeṇa

original: tadatyantasāmyavatsu mukteṣu nityeṣvapi hi tatsāmyasyaiva saṃrakṣaṇāya dharmigrāhakasiddhā yāvadātmabhāvinaste te viśeṣā na parityaktāḥ /
analyzed: tad atyanta sāmyavatsu mukteṣu nityeṣu api hi tad sāmyasya eva saṃrakṣaṇāya dharmi grāhaka siddhāḥ yāvadātmabhāvinaḥ te te viśeṣāḥ na parityaktāḥ
na ca īśvara dvaitam
yena īśvarāṇām mithas vyāvṛtta pratītyai viśeṣam kalpayiṣyāmaḥ
ekasya eva sarva deśa kāleṣu eka ātapatra tayā sarva śruti siddha tvāt

original: asyaiva ca sāmānyaśabdairviśeṣaśabdaiśca rūḍhito yogatastattadvasatuviśiṣṭatvādinā ca tattatprakaraṇānuguṇaṃ śarīrake pratipādyatvasthāpanāt
analyzed: asya eva ca sāmānya śabdaiḥ viśeṣa śabdaiḥ ca rūḍhitaḥ yogataḥ tad tad vasatu viśiṣṭa tva ādinā ca tad tad prakaraṇa anuguṇam śarīrake pratipādya tva sthāpanāt
jīveṣu api baddhānām mithas bhedaḥ tad tad sukha duḥkha dhī icchā vaicitryeṇa vyaktaḥ
baddha muktayoḥ ca kiñcijjñatva sarvajñatva ādibhiḥ
muktānām nityānām ca viśuddheḥ ādimat tva anādimat tvābhyām eva vibhakta dhī saṃbhavaḥ

original: muktadaśāyāṃ nityebhyaḥ kiṃ vaiṣmyamiti cet, kiṃ tena ? /
analyzed: mukta daśāyām nityebhyaḥ kim vaiṣmyam iti ced kim tena
prāktanena tad tad ātma varti tayā pratyakṣitena guṇa ādi bhedena tad anya vyāvṛtta dhī siddheḥ

original: siddhairapi tadvyavahāre prāktanopādhibhedaireva tattatpramāṇapramitaiḥ pratisaṃhitaiḥ sarvanirvāhāt /
analyzed: siddhaiḥ api tad vyavahāre prāktana upādhi bhedaiḥ eva tad tad pramāṇa pramitaiḥ pratisaṃhitaiḥ sarva nirvāhāt
etena muktānām mithas vibhakta buddhiḥ api nirvyūḍhā
na hi teṣām eka rūpaḥ prāktanaḥ saṃsāraḥ
viṣama vipāka samaya anādi asaṃkhyāta karma pravāha vaicitrya pratiniyata deśa kāla sva rūpa sukha duḥkha tad kāraṇa ādi saṃtateḥ eva mithas vyāvartaka tvāt

original: tadatadvibhāgo hi tatkālavartinaivaṃ dharmeṇeti na niyamaḥ,
analyzed: tad a tad vibhāgaḥ hi tad kāla vartinā evam dharmeṇa iti na niyamaḥ
atatkālavartinā api tad niṣṭhatayā upalabhyamānena tad siddheḥ
na hi atītaḥ saṃsāraḥ mukta ātma svarūpam upalabhamānaiḥ na upalabhyate
upalabhyamānaḥ vā anya niṣṭhaḥ pratibhāti
atha nityeṣu mithas kā vārtrā
sā api kuśalā eva

original: teṣāmapi hi satyasaṃkalpānāṃ vicitrāḥ saṃkalpecchādaya riśvarasyevāniyatadeśakālaviṣayāparyanuyojyasāmagrīkā anādyanantasaṃtānavantaḥ santīti  #
analyzed: teṣām api hi satya saṃkalpānām vicitrāḥ saṃkalpa icchā ādayaḥ riśvarasya iva aniyata deśa kāla viṣaya a paryanuyojya sāmagrīkāḥ anādi ananta saṃtānavantaḥ santi iti
kim anyena viśeṣeṇa

original: api ca yaddarśane yatra yadāropo na bhavati sa hi tasya tato bhedaḥ /
analyzed: api ca yad darśane yatra yad āropaḥ na bhavati sa hi tasya tatas bhedaḥ
saḥ eva ca viśeṣaḥ

original: sa cet svarūpabhūtohantvamādirūpeṇa bhātaḥ parāropaṃ pratirundhyāt,
analyzed: sa ced sva rūpa bhūta ūhantvam ādi rūpeṇa bhātaḥ para āropam pratirundhyāt
kaḥ tatonyaḥ tatas viśeṣaḥ tasya
evam anabhyupagame viśeṣa kḷptau api kā gatiḥ vaiśeṣikasya
sva para nirvāhakāḥ te viśeṣāḥ
iti ced kim te eva

original: api ca pṛthaktve vidyamāne kiṃ tairviśeṣaiḥ ? /
analyzed: api ca pṛthaktve vidyamāne kim taiḥ viśeṣaiḥ
pṛthaktvasya eka jāti saṃgṛhīta tvāt na tatas api vyāvṛtta dhīrī iti ced
tarhi tatas na kvacid api syāt
viśeṣeṣu api vā viśeṣa tva ākrānteṣu kaḥ te nistāraḥ

original: viśeṣatvaṃ nāma jātirnāstīti cet, kiṃ tat ? /
analyzed: viśeṣa tvam nāma jātiḥ na asti iti ced kim tat
upādhiḥ iti ced
kim tatas na saṃgrahaḥ
tathā sati kvacid api tad nibandhana anuvṛtta dhī bhaṅga prasaṅgāt
evam anyonya abhāvena api gatārtha tā dustarā iti parāstaḥ para abhimata viśeṣaḥ
sāmānyam api para uktam sūtrakāraiḥ eva nirasta prāyam
tathā hi tad ananyatvam ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ ityādibhiḥ sūtraiḥ kārya daśāyām upādānasya avasthā antara āpatti mātram eva

original: na punaḥ parābhimatamavayavyākhyaṃ dravyamastīti samarthanād ghaṭādyavayavyabhāve
analyzed: na punar para abhimatam avayavi ākhyam dravyam asti iti samarthanāt ghaṭa ādi avayavi abhāve
tad āśrita ghaṭa tva ādi sāmānyam avayavi samaveta tayā abhyupagata guṇa ādayaḥ tad ubhaya ārambha prakriyā jālam ca nirmūlitam
yat ca upādānasya ghaṭa tva ādi rūpam avasthā antaram saṃyoga viśeṣa ādi rūpam

original: tat parairapi kāryatayābhyupetamupalambhādibhiśca tathaiva sidhyatīti na tatrāpi nityatvakalpanāvakāśaḥ /
analyzed: tat paraiḥ api kārya tayā abhyupetam upalambha ādibhiḥ ca tathā eva sidhyati iti na tatra api nitya tva kalpanā avakāśaḥ

original: tataḥ sarveṣāṃ dravyāṇāṃ svarūpatonādyanantatvāt kāryadravyatvātmatvādimātrameva śiṣyate /
analyzed: tatas sarveṣām dravyāṇām svarūpataḥ ūna ādi ananta tvāt kārya dravya tva ātma tva ādi mātram eva śiṣyate
guṇeṣu nityeṣu avasthā rūpeṣu ca anuvṛtta pratyaya nimittam kim iti cintyam
tatra evam bhāṣitam śārīraka ādye saṃsthāna atirekiṇā unekeṣu eka ākāra buddhi bodhyasya adarśanāt
tāvatā eva go tva ādi jāti vyavahāra upapatteḥ
atireka vāde api saṃsthānasya saṃpratipanna tvāt ca saṃsthānam eva jāti

original: saṃsthānaṃ nāma svāsādhāraṇaṃ rūpamiti yathāvastu saṃsthānamanusaṃdheyam” iti /
analyzed: saṃsthānam nāma sva asādhāraṇam rūpam iti yathāvastu saṃsthānam anusaṃdheyam iti
etat uktam bhavati kim saṃsthāna atiriktam sāmānyam vivikta sphuṭa pratyakṣa adhyavasāya bhedāt aṅgīkriyate
uta upapatti balāt iti na ādyaḥ
asiddheḥ na antyaḥ
anyathā asiddheḥ

original: atiriktasāmānyamabhyupagacchatopi hi tadupalakṣaṇaṃ saṃsthānamiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ca /
analyzed: atirikta sāmānyam abhyupagacchataḥ api hi tad upalakṣaṇam saṃsthānam iṣṭam dṛṣṭam ca
prati vyakti niyatam saṃsthānam katham anuvṛtta pratyaya kāraṇam iti ced
katham vā tad jātīyasya lakṣaṇam bhavati
anuvṛtta jāti antara saṃgṛhīta upādhi rūpatayā iti ced
tāvatā eva gavādi vyavahāra siddhau kim anyena
tathā api antatas nuvṛttam sāmānyam kvacid abhyupagantavyam
yatra ananyathāsiddhiḥ
anyathā upādhi saṃgrahasya api asaṃbhavāt iti ced

original: tavāpi vā tatra sāmānyamupalakṣaṇena saṃgṛhyate, na vā ?
analyzed: tava api vā tatra sāmānyam upalakṣaṇena saṃgṛhyate na vā
pūrvatra anyathā asiddhiḥ anavasthitiḥ ca
uttaratra niyāmaka adarśanāt jāteḥ āśraya vyavasthā na syāt

original: vyāvṛttānāmapi svabhāvata eva kāsāṃcit vyaktīnāṃ tadvyañjakatvaniyatiriti cet,
analyzed: vyāvṛttānām api svabhāvataḥ eva kāsāṃcid vyaktīnām tad vyañjaka tva niyatiḥ iti ced

original: sa eva svabhāvaḥ kiṃ na vyavahāraṃ niyachet /
analyzed: saḥ eva svabhāvaḥ kim na vyavahāram niyacchet
nirviṣayaḥ katham vyavahāraḥ syāt iti ced
tāsām eva vyaktīnām viṣaya tvāt
vyāvṛttānām anuvṛtta vyavahāra viṣaya tve sarvatra viṣaya vyavasthā bhajyeta iti ced

original: vyāvṛttānāmanuvṛttavyañjakatve sarvatra tadvyaktiḥ kiṃ na syāt ? /
analyzed: vyāvṛttānām anuvṛtta vyañjaka tve sarvatra tad vyaktiḥ kim na syāt
saṃbandha asaṃbandhābhyām niyamāt iti ced na
saṃbandhasya api samavāya nāmnaḥ sārvatrika tva abhyupagamāt tatra api abhivyakti pratiniyamasya mṛgya tvāt
nānā samavāya vādaḥ api vyakti svabhāva niyamasya dustyaja tvāt

original: tathāpi dṛṣṭaikagovyaktervyaktyantare soyamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ kathaṃ syāt ?
analyzed: tathā api dṛṣṭa eka go vyakteḥ vyakti antare saḥ uyam iti pratyabhijñānam katham syāt

original: ayaṃ gaurityekavyaktau vyutpāditaśca kathaṃ vyaktyatyantarepi tacchabdavācyatāṃ pratīyāt ?
analyzed: ayam gauḥ iti eka vyaktau vyutpāditaḥ ca katham vyakti atyantare pi tad śabda vācya tām pratīyāt
iti ced tava api vā katham
eka dharma samavāyāt iti ced

original: tenaiva dharmeṇa svato militasya samavāyasyaiva nityaṃ sarvatra vṛttyabhyupagamena sarvatra sarvavyavahārasaṃkaraprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tena eva dharmeṇa svatas militasya samavāyasya eva nityam sarvatra vṛtti abhyupagamena sarvatra sarva vyavahāra saṃkara prasaṅgāt
kāsāṃcid eva vyaktīnām tad vyañjaka tva svābhāvyāt vyavasthā uktā iti ced
tarhi tāsām eva vyaktīnām pratisaṃdhāna vyavahārayoḥ viṣaya tvam astu

original: tathā sati bhrāntatvaṃ tayoḥ syāditi cenna,
analyzed: tathā sati bhrānta tvam tayoḥ syāt iti ced na
tad vyakti tvena pratisaṃdhāna ādeḥ abhāvāt

original: api tarhi tathātvena vyaktisvarūpātiriktaṃ tathātvaṃ nāmāntareṇa jātireva syāditi cet,
analyzed: api tarhi tathātvena vyakti svarūpa atiriktam tathātvam nāma antareṇa jātiḥ eva syāt iti ced

original: tajjātivyañjakaṃ tattadekavyaktisvarūpātiriktaṃ kiṃ na jātyantaraṃ syāt ? /
analyzed: tad jāti vyañjakam tad tad eka vyakti svarūpa atiriktam kim na jāti antaram syāt
upādhi viśeṣaḥ eva ayam pratiniyata āśrayaḥ iti ced

original: evaṃ tarhi pratiniyatapratiyogikaṃ svabhāvaniyataṃ parasparasmārakatvamupajīvya tajjātīyatayā pratisaṃdhānavyavahāropapattau kimanyakalpanena
analyzed: evam tarhi pratiniyata pratiyogikam svabhāva niyatam paraspara smāraka tvam upajīvya tad jātīya tayā pratisaṃdhāna vyavahāra upapattau kim anya kalpanena
tasmāraka tad itara vibhāgaḥ kutastyaḥ iti ced
tad vyañjaka tad itara vibhāgaḥ te kutastyaḥ
darśana adarśana āyattaḥ iti ced tulyam
saṃbandha sādṛśyayoḥ abhāve katham smāraka tvam iti ced
tayoḥ vā katham
sadṛśa saha anubhūta darśanasya saṃskāra udbodhaka tvāt iti ced
tat api kutas
kārya darśanāt kalpyate iti ced

original: tulyam; anyathā saṃbandhaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vaikamupādāya tadanyasya kathaṃ smārakatvamiti codyasya durvāratvāt /
analyzed: tulyam anyathā saṃbandham sādṛśyam vā ekam upādāya tad anyasya katham smāraka tvam iti codyasya durvāra tvāt
na ca atra sādṛśyam na aṅgīkurmaḥ
sausādṛśya rūpa tva abhyupagamāt sāmānyasya
nāma antareṇa para abhimata jāti svīkāraḥ iti ced
vyāvṛttānām saṃniveśa ādīnām eva pratiniyata pratiyogi smāraka svabhāva tayā sādṛśya rūpa tvāt
gavaya ādeḥ api tarhi go jātīya tva ādi prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na
sādṛśya sausādṛśya vibhāga svaya sāṃpratyayikasya sarva saṃmata tvāt iti

original: evaṃ sāmānyādiṣu sūtrakārādibhirnirasteṣu pariśiṣṭā dravyaguṇakarmarūpāstrayaḥ padārthāḥ iti kecidācāryāḥ //
analyzed: evam sāmānya ādiṣu sūtrakāra ādibhiḥ nirasteṣu pariśiṣṭāḥ dravya guṇa karma rūpāḥ trayaḥ padārthāḥ iti kecid ācāryāḥ

original: nyā. pa. prame. 2 anye tu manyante---yathā tatpratīteranyathāsiddhatayā te padārthā bhāṣyakārādibhirnirasyante,
analyzed: anye tu manyante yathā tad pratīteḥ anyathā asiddha tayā te padārthāḥ bhāṣyakāra ādibhiḥ nirasyante
tathā karma api iti

original: ye tāvadiha sarvatra sūryaparispandādivadapratyakṣaṃ karma phalānumeyamicchanti /
analyzed: ye tāvat iha sarvatra sūrya parispanda ādi vat apratyakṣam karma phala anumeyam icchanti

original: tatra yayā sāmagryā karmaṇaḥ siddhirabhimatā tayaiva dṛṣṭaṃ karmaphalaṃ sādhyatām,
analyzed: tatra yayā sāmagryā karmaṇaḥ siddhiḥ abhimatā tayā eva dṛṣṭam karma phalam sādhyatām
kim antarā kalpitena karmaṇā
tathā api ced kḷptiḥ
anyatra api kāla viprakarṣa adarśane pi sāmagrī kāryayoḥ madhye anyasya kḷpti prasaṅgaḥ
tathā eva ca tra tra api iti anavasthā syāt
ye ca pratyakṣam karma iti āhuḥ

original: tairapi nūnaṃ karmaphalatvenābhyupagamasaṃyogavibhāgātiriktaṃ nipuṇanirīkṣaṇepi nopalabhyata iti manyāmahe /
analyzed: taiḥ api nūnam karma phala tvena abhyupagama saṃyoga vibhāga atiriktam nipuṇa nirīkṣaṇe api nā upalabhyate iti manyāmahe
calati pratyayaḥ api hi tāvatā eva caritārthaḥ

original: na ca vācyaṃ yāvatsaṃyogaṃ calatipratyayaprasaṅga iti,
analyzed: na ca vācyam yāvat saṃyogam calati pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ iti
pūrva deśa vibhāga pūrvaka deśa antara saṃyoga prathama kṣaṇa viṣaya tvāt tad pratyayasya

original: tata eva hyuttarakāle saṃyoge vartamānepyacaladiti bhūtānusaṃdhānamupapannam /
analyzed: tatas eva hi uttara kāle saṃyoge vartamāne ipi acalat iti bhūta anusaṃdhānam upapannam

original: nanu pravāhamadhyasthite sthāṇau pūrvasalilaskandhaviyogaḥ uttarasalilaskandhayogaśca dṛśyate,
analyzed: nanu pravāha madhya sthite sthāṇau pūrva salila skandha viyogaḥ uttara salila skandha yogaḥ ca dṛśyate
na ca tatra calatvam icchāmaḥ

original: vyomādaya eva sthiradeśatvena vivakṣitāḥ iti cenna,
analyzed: vyoma ādayaḥ eva sthira deśa tvena vivakṣitāḥ iti ced na
pravāhasya tatas viśeṣa adarśanāt
laulyam viśeṣaḥ iti ced

original: tarhi saṃyogavibhāgātiriktaṃ laulyarūpaṃ karmapratyakṣamiti kathaṃ tadapahnavaḥ ? iti /
analyzed: tarhi saṃyoga vibhāga atiriktam laulya rūpam karma pratyakṣam iti katham tad apahnavaḥ iti

original: tatrāhuḥ---yā nāma karmasāmagrī tvayeṣyate sā tattatkarmaphalatayābhimataṃ saṃyogaviśeṣamutpādayantī niyatasvabhāvameva tamutpādayati /
analyzed: tatra āhuḥ yā nāma karma sāmagrī tvayā iṣyate sā tad tad karma phalatayā abhimatam saṃyoga viśeṣam utpādayantī niyata svabhāvam eva tam utpādayati

original: ata eva eva saṃyogonekaniṣṭhopi san kvaciccalatipratyaṃyaṃ kvacit saṃyogamātrapratyayaṃ ca janayati,
analyzed: atas eva eva saṃyoga ūneka niṣṭhaḥ api san kvacid calati pratyaṃyam kvacid saṃyoga mātra pratyayam ca janayati

original: yathaika eva samavāyoguṇaguṇibhyāmaviśeṣeṇa svato militopi san kvacidāśrayapratyayaṃ kvacidāśritapratyayaṃ ca janayati,
analyzed: yathā ekaḥ eva samavāyaḥ guṇa guṇibhyām aviśeṣeṇa svatas militaḥ api san kvacid āśraya pratyayam kvacid āśrita pratyayam ca janayati
na hi āśraya bhāvaḥ āśrita bhāvaḥ vā samavāya svarūpa atiriktaḥ
tadvat iha api iti
vayam tu brūmaḥ apratyakṣa karma vādaḥ tāvat prāc ukta dūṣaṇāt ayuktaḥ
pratyakṣam tu karma svarūpataḥ durapahnavam
tatra bhāṣya ādiṣu atireka vidhi niṣedha adarśanāt artha antara virodha abhāvāt ca udāsitavyam iti

original: idaṃ tu manyāmahe--- atirekepi guṇavargānna rāśyantaraṃ karma,
analyzed: idam tu manyāmahe atireke api guṇa vargāt na rāśi antaram karma
vibhājaka abhāvāt

original: svecchākalpitavibhājakasya sarvatra sulabhatvena yathābhimatamekaṃ guṇamubhayaṃ vāṅgīkṛtya rāśyantarakalpanaprasaṅgāt,
analyzed: sva icchā kalpita vibhājakasya sarvatra sulabha tvena yathā abhimatam ekam guṇam ubhayam vā aṅgīkṛtya rāśi antara kalpana prasaṅgāt
atas dravyam adravyam iti eva vibhāgaḥ iti

original: nyā. pa. prame. 3 tatra cātmaguṇatayābhimateṣu sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnāḥ pañca tattadutpādakatayābhimatabuddhiviśeṣānatiriktā vedārthasaṃgrahe  #
analyzed: nyā pa prame  tatra ca ātma guṇa tayā abhimateṣu sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatnāḥ pañca tad tad utpādaka tayā abhimata buddhi viśeṣa anatiriktāḥ vedārthasaṃgrahe
samarthitāḥ
dharma adharmau vihita niṣiddha kriyā sādhya tayā abhimatau ājñāvataḥ rājñaḥ iva sarva praśāsituḥ īśvarasya anugraha nigraha ākhya buddhi viśeṣa rūpau bhāṣya ādiṣu
bahuṣu pradeśeṣu prapañcitau
yaḥ punar saṃskāraḥ sa tāvat buddhi viśeṣa ātmanā uktaḥ
na ca tad prayuktaḥ
tatas cira naṣṭa viprakṛṣṭa ākāre vyāpti adarśanāt
vāsanā anuvṛtteḥ ca vācanika tvāt

original: nyā. pa. prame. 4 yadyapi “indriyasyendriyasyārthe” ityādigītāślokeṣu bhāṣyakārairvāsanāyā icchādvāreṇaiva pravṛttihetutvavacanājjñānavāsanāviśeṣātiriktā  #
analyzed: nyā pa prame  yadi api indriyasya indriyasya arthe ityādi gītā ślokeṣu bhāṣyakāraiḥ vāsanāyāḥ icchā dvāreṇa eva pravṛtti hetutva vacanāt jñāna vāsanā viśeṣa atiriktā  /
karma vāsanā na asti
tathā api jñāna vāsanā durapahnavā
tatas ca tad āśraya mātram vicāryam
tatra dharma bhūta jñānasya tad niṣṭha smṛti ākhya vikāra utpādakaḥ saṃskāraḥ api tad niṣṭhaḥ
antaraṅga tvāt abādhāt ca

original: nyā. pa. prame. 5 ye tu paraparibhāṣamanusarantastadanuguṇaṃ tasya guṇatvaṃ gṛhṇanti,
analyzed: ye tu para paribhāṣam anusarantaḥ tad anuguṇam tasya guṇa tvam gṛhṇanti
teṣām ātmani eva saṃskāraḥ
iti viśeṣaḥ

original: na ca buddhornityatvaṃ saṃkocavikāsādidaśābhedaṃ cābhyupagacchadbhiradravyatvaṃ tasyāḥ suvacam;
analyzed: na ca buddhoḥ nitya tvam saṃkoca vikāsa ādi daśā bhedam ca abhyupagacchadbhiḥ adravya tvam tasyāḥ suvacam
avasthā antara yogi tvam eva hi upādana tvam
tat eva hi dravya lakṣaṇam
tathā api na guṇa tva hāniḥ
apṛthak siddha viśeṣaṇa tva atirikta guṇa tva avadarśanāt
karma vyatirikta jāti mātra āśraya tva ādi rūpa guṇa lakṣaṇa saṃketasya asmābhiḥ an ādaraṇāt
na ca dravyasya āśrita svabhāva tva lakṣaṇam apṛthak siddha viśeṣaṇa tvam viruddham
avayavini yuṣmābhiḥ api svīkaraṇāt
yathā ca dravya tva viśeṣaṇa tva ādibhiḥ na virodhaḥ iṣyate
evam atra api
upalaṃmbha yukti ādeḥ sāmana carca tvāt
atas jñānam dravyam
tad avasthā viśeṣāḥ tu adravyāṇi iti saṃskāra ākhya vikāra asthitiḥ api tatra eva yuktā
vega ākhyaḥ tu saṃskāraḥ tad utpādaka tva abhimata karma viśaiṣa atiriktaḥ na dṛśyate
na ca yujyate

original: sthitasthāpakau tu karmanivṛttāvapi tadavinābhūtasaṃyogaviśeṣatvaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam //
analyzed: sthita sthāpakau tu karma nivṛttau api tad avinābhūta saṃyoga viśeṣa tvam vaktum yuktam

original: nyā. pa. prame. 6 ye ca bhagavatonantā maṅgalaguṇāḥ prakīrtyante,
analyzed: ye ca bhagavataḥ anantāḥ maṅgala guṇāḥ prakīrtyante
te sarve api ṣāṅguṇya vitati rūpāḥ iti saṃmatam
yathā āhuḥ tava ananta guṇasya api ṣaṭ eva prathame guṇāḥ
yaiḥ tvayā iva jagat kukṣau anye pi antar niveśitāḥ
iti
ṣaṭsu ca guṇeṣu balam dhāraṇa sāmarthyam
aiśvaryam niyamana śaktiḥ
vikāra hetuṣu api avikṛta tvam vīryam
tejaḥ para abhibhavana sāmarthyam
anya an apekṣa tā vā iti
lakṣitānām caturṇām atimathane jñānaśakti vitati rūpa tvam vyaktam
na ca jñāna śaktyoḥ api evam mithas ntarbhāvaḥ śakyaḥ
ajñeṣu api dravyeṣu śakti darśanāt
aśakteṣu api jñāna darśanāt
atas eva jñāna viśeṣaḥ śaktiḥ iti api nirastam
śakti viśeṣaḥ tu jñānam syāt iti ced
kaḥ asau śakti śabda arthaḥ

original: vilakṣaṇo guṇaviśeṣaḥ prabhākarādinayena padārthāntaraṃ vā iti cet,
analyzed: vilakṣaṇaḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ prabhākara ādi nayena padārtha antaram vā iti ced
na tarhi jñānasya tad viśeṣa tā sidhyet
atha kārya upayukta viśeṣaṇa mātram śaktiḥ iti sarva prayoga anugatam paśyasi
tadā na kevalam jñānasya
api tu sarvasya eva śakti tvam prāptam
sarvasya api pradhāna kāraṇatayā abhimate kasmiṃścid viśeṣaṇa tvena avasthānāt
nanu evam udayana ādīnām iva svarūpa sahakāri vyatirikta śakti abhāvaḥ prasaktaḥ iti ced
ananyathā siddha yukti vaśāt āgama balāt vā tad siddheḥ
tad śabdaḥ tu vivakṣā viśeṣāt syāt iti brūmaḥ
śakti samarthana saṃrambhaḥ ca ācāryāṇām nyāya kuliśe nipuṇam anusaṃdheyaḥ
śakti mātra kāraṇa ādi vādāḥ ca bāhyānām upalambha yukti āpta āgama ādi virahāt anādaraṇīyāḥ
sā ced upādānam
sūkṣman dravyam eva asau syāt iti na vivādaḥ

original: nyā. pa. prame. 7 athāciddravyaviśeṣaguṇān paśyāmaḥ--- tatra śabdādayaḥ pañca tattadbhūtavartinaḥ pratyakṣādibalādabhyupagatāḥ /
analyzed: nyā pa prame  atha acit dravya viśeṣa guṇān paśyāmaḥ tatra śabda ādayaḥ pañca tad tad bhūta vartinaḥ pratyakṣa ādi balāt abhyupagatāḥ
sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi ca śāstra anusāreṇa
saṃyogaḥ ca pratyakṣa ādi siddhaḥ
nairantarya mātram eva ayam iti ced
tat kim dravya svarūpam
uta āgantuḥ avasthā viśeṣaḥ
na ādyaḥ nitya tva prasaṅgāt
na dvitīyaḥ
nāma antareṇa tad abhidhānāt iti
vibhāga pṛthaktve tu abhāva ukta nyāyena dūṣaṇīye
paratva aparatve api sukha ādi chāyayā
na hi tad tad upādhi avacchinna deśa kāla viśeṣa saṃbandha atirikte paratva aparatve paśyāmaḥ

original: tatkalpane ca prāktvapratyaktvādayopi hi bahavo guṇāstulyanyāyāḥ kalpyāḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: tad kalpane ca prāktva pratyaktva ādayaḥ api hi bahavaḥ guṇāḥ tulya nyāyāḥ kalpyāḥ syuḥ
evam sat asat guṇa pradarśana prakriyayā saṃkhyā parimāṇa guru tva drava tva snehānām tattvam avasātavyam
iti adravyeṣu eṣā diś

original: nyā. pa. prame. 8 atha dravyāṇi vimṛśyante--- tatra tāvat kaumārilābhimatavibhuśabdākhyadravyavādaḥ śabdasyācidavasthāviśeṣatvena śrutyādisiddhatvānnirākāryaḥ
analyzed: atha dravyāṇi vimṛśyante tatra tāvat kaumārila abhimata vibhu śabda ākhya dravya vādaḥ śabdasya a cit avasthā viśeṣa tvena śruti ādi siddha tvāt nirākāryaḥ
ātmasiddhau tu śabdasya dharmi ativarti tva gatimat tva vādaḥ tad āśraya bhūta avayava dvāreṇa iti netavyaḥ
yat tu tamaḥ khalu calam nīlam para apara vibhāgavat
prasiddha dravya vaidharmyāt navabhyaḥ bhettum arhati
iti āhuḥ tat etat dravyam tāvat abhyupagacchāmaḥ

original: tathā hyuktaṃ varadagurubhistattvasāre--- “tamo nāma dravyaṃ bahulaviralaṃ mecakacalaṃ pratīmaḥ kenāpi kvacidapi na bādhaśca dadṛśe /
analyzed: tathā hi uktam vara da gurubhiḥ tattvasāre tamaḥ nāma dravyam bahula viralam mecaka calam pratīmaḥ kena api kvacid api na bādhaḥ ca dadṛśe

original: ataḥ kalpyo hetuḥ pramitirapi śābdī vijayate nirālokaṃ cakṣuḥ prathayati hi tad darśanavaśāt” //
analyzed: atas kalpyaḥ hetuḥ pramitiḥ api śābdī vijayate nirālokam cakṣuḥ prathayati hi tat darśana vaśāt
iti

original: etena viyati vitatānāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ pṛthivyavayavānāṃ kṛṣṇo guṇastama iti pakṣopi pratikṣiptaḥ;
analyzed: etena viyati vitatānām sūkṣmāṇām pṛthivī avayavānām kṛṣṇaḥ guṇaḥ tamaḥ iti pakṣaḥ api pratikṣiptaḥ
sa āśrayasya eva tasya grahaṇa virodha abhāvāt
guṇa mātra tayā ca kasya api anupalambhāt

original: sparśarūparasānāṃ ca śabdagandhavad bhrāntau pramitau vā nirādhāragrahaṇādarśanācca--iti /
analyzed: sparśa rūpa rasānām ca śabda gandha vat bhrāntau pramitau vā nirādhāra grahaṇa adarśanāt ca eti

original: evaṃ dravyatve siddhe kṛṣṇavarṇasya dravyasya pṛthivītvamevābhyupagantumucitam,
analyzed: evam dravya tve siddhe kṛṣṇa varṇasya dravyasya pṛthivī tvam eva abhyupagantum ucitam
yat kṛṣṇam tat annasya iti śruteḥ
yadi api pṛthivyām pāka viśeṣa vaśāt śukla ādi rūpam
na anyatra pākāt api bhavati
ākāśa ādiṣu nailya upalambhaḥ api hi pañcīkaraṇa mūla pṛthivī saṃsargāt
ākāśe ca aviśeṣāt iti sūtre bhāṣitam aṇḍa antar vartinaḥ ca ākāśasya rūpava tvāt cākṣuṣa tve pi avirodhaḥ
iti

original: nanvevamākāśameva dravyāntarasaṃsargānnīlaṃ tama ityupalabhyate iti syāditi cet,
analyzed: nanu evam ākāśam eva dravya antara saṃsargāt nīlam tamaḥ iti upalabhyate iti syāt iti ced
na syāt
ākāśe tamaḥ iti pṛthak upalambha svārasyāt
tu kalpanā gauravāt
pañcīkaraṇena dravya antara saṃsargasya abhyupagata tvāt ca iti
sparśa anupalambhaḥ tu indranīla āloka durdina ātapa ādeḥ iva anudbhava ādeḥ api
syāt
na ca pārthiva rūpasya sarvasya āloka sāpekṣa cakṣuḥ grāhya tva niyamaḥ kalpyaḥ
karaṇa vaicitryāt iva viṣaya vaicitryāt api vyavasthā upapatteḥ

original: divābhītānāṃ viśiṣṭāñjanarañjitākṣāṇāṃ cālokanirapekṣameva cakṣuṣaiva padārthā gṛhyante /
analyzed: divā abhītānām viśiṣṭa añjana rañjita akṣāṇām ca āloka nirapekṣam eva cakṣuṣā eva padārthāḥ gṛhyante
āloka abhāva mātre ca tamasi tamaḥ jyotiṣoḥ nivṛtti vacanam
pratiniyata nailya āropa kalpanā prayāsaḥ ca
atas pṛthivī viśeṣa tvam tamasaḥ yuktam

original: pṛthivyādīni pañca bhūtāni manaśca triguṇadravyapariṇativiśeṣatayā śrutyādisiddhatvānna pṛthagdravyāṇi /
analyzed: pṛthivī ādīni pañca bhūtāni manaḥ ca triguṇa dravya pariṇati viśeṣa tayā śruti ādi siddha tvāt na pṛthak dravyāṇi
tatra ca avayavi ākhyam bhautika dravyam tad ananya tvam ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ ityādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sūtraiḥ buddhi śabda antara ādeḥ anyathāsiddhi ādi upapādanena
nirastam
mahat dīrghavat vā hva sva parimaṇḍalābhyām ityādibhiḥ ca parām abhimataḥ paramāṇuḥ
atas pariṇāma viśeṣāt upalambha yogya tva ayogya tva ādi daśā viśeṣa yogi prakṛti ādi saṃjñam dravyam vicitra vyavasthita krama samaṣṭi vyaṣṭi rūpam avatiṣṭhate
diś tattvam api tad tad upādhi avacchinnāḥ tad tad deśa viśeṣāḥ eva
atirikta kalpakānām para apara pratyaya viśeṣa ādīnām anyathā siddheḥ
diś utpatti śrutiḥ ca tad upādhika tad nirvāhaka sṛṣṭyā upapannā
anyathā dyu pṛthivī antarikṣa ādi vat triguṇa pariṇati viśeṣa tā eva syāt
na pṛthak dravya tā
na ca evam kāle api prasaṅgaḥ
nityasya kālasya bhagavat parāśara ādibhiḥ pṛthak prasaṃkhyānāt
tasya prakṛti pariṇati viśeṣa tva ādi pakṣāḥ tad pūrva apara kāla avaśyaṃbhāvāt śruti ādi balāt ca pratyastāḥ
atas triguṇa kālau ātmā ca iti trīṇi
iśvarasya tu pṛthak saṃkhyāne catvāri

original: tasya hi cetanatvādibhiḥ saṃgrahasaṃbhavepyavāntaravailakṣaṇyajñāpanāya pṛthaksaṃkhyānaṃ prācāmanādivācāṃ ca,
analyzed: tasya hi cetana tva ādibhiḥ saṃgraha saṃbhave pi avāntara vailakṣaṇya jñāpanāya pṛthak saṃkhyānam prācām anādi vācām ca
anyathā prakriyā antareṇa acetaneṣu api saṃgraha prasaṃgāt

original: viviktaṃ ca bhagavatā parāśareṇa--- “paramātmātmanoryogaḥ paramārtha itīṣyate /
analyzed: viviktam ca bhagavatā parāśareṇa parama ātma ātmanoḥ yogaḥ parama arthaḥ iti iṣyate
mithyā etat anya dravyam hi nā eti tad dravya tām yatas
iti
evam dharma bhūta jñāna ākhyam api dravyam ajaḍa tva aviśeṣe pi spuṭatara vaidharmya anatara balāt pṛthak gaṇayanti
tasya adravya tva vādaḥ keṣāñcid nātha muni yāmuna muni bhāṣyakāra ādi prabandha virodhāt prāyas para citta rañjana arthaḥ
śuddha sattva ākhyasya ca dravya antarasya para vigraha ādi yāthārthya upadeśa pravṛtta nirukta ādi āpta āgama siddha tvāt sūkṣma triguṇa avasthā viśeṣa ādi pakṣāḥ bahiṣkāryāḥ
atas ṣaḍ etāni dravyāṇi

original: bhoktṛbhogyaniyantṝṇāṃ sadātmanaikadravyatvādipakṣā api nirviśeṣasanmātrapakṣavad vyāghātaśrutivirodhādibhirbahuśo bhāṣyādiṣu nirastāḥ /
analyzed: bhoktṛ bhogya niyantṝṇām sat ātmanā eka dravya tva ādi pakṣāḥ api nirviśeṣa sanmātra pakṣa vat vyāghāta śruti virodha ādibhiḥ bahuśas bhāṣya ādiṣu nirastāḥ
tatra triguṇa śuddha sattve sva niruktyā eva lakṣye
kṣaṇa lava ādi ātmā kālaḥ
aṇuḥ jñātā jīvaḥ
vibhuḥ tu īśvaraḥ
evam triguṇa kāla jīva īśvara śuddha sattva mati rūpeṇa ṣoḍhā dravya vibhāgaḥ
evam pramāṇa sārtha ghaṇṭāpathena dravya adravya rūpa prameya grāmam adhijigamiṣatām na kudṛṣṭi bāhya kalpita kūṭa yukti garta nipātaḥ iti

original: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau prameyādhyāye prathamamāhnikam
analyzed: iti śrī kavi tārkikasiṃhasya sarva tantra svatantrasya śrīmat veṅkaṭanāthasya vedānta ācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau prameya adhyāye prathamam āhnikam
